blog.name: im-tops-bottom
blog.title: My life goal?
blog.description: To out sass Thranduil

tags: people are either born with a wolf designated to them
or they grow up and find their soul wolf to bond with
tony is the only one who never found his wolf
a person can lose their bond by either dying or their wolf dying
once bonds are formed they cant be broken w/o death
Bruce's wolf protected him and got hit by radiation
hulk is a giant giant puppy
even gods have wolves of their own
summary: A fic idea....
body:
A fic idea….

Bruce has a green mutated giant wolf that deals poison damage, can jump high and far and is incredibly strong named Hulk.

Natasha has a black furred wolf that has sharp eyes, elegant and graceful and takes no crap from no one named Black Widow.

Thor has a golden furred wolf half the size of Hulk (which is still pretty big) that has blue eyes and deals heavy electrical damage. His name is Mijonir.

Clint has a purple-black furred wolf that has real good sense and eye sight. He is light on his feet and can move real quick. His name is Hawkeye.

Steve has a white furred wolf with one blue eye and one red eye that is just as old as him. They were frozen together and brought back in the 21st century. Captain America developed ice powers and has the super soldier serum just like his owner. He can catch the shield in midair and send it flying a different way during battle. Fast thinker as well.

James has a black wolf that has a metal arm just like his one. During the 40s they fell off the train and was taken by Hydra. They both had their mindwiped and went through the winter soldier program. His wolf’s name was originally Snowflake but Hydra changed it to Bucky while James was dubbed the winter soldier. With the new version of the super Soldier serum he is twice as strong, twice as fast ad Captain America.

When Tony Stark was born he never got a wolf. Howard thought they were a waste of time and showed Tony exactly what he thought of them as he used to beat his own one up. Maria was smart enough to keep her wolf away from Howard. One night Howard got real drunk and murdered his wolf, marias wolf and ana and jarvis’ wolves. Then he beat up Tony for being useless and worthless. Tony grew up never getting one and once his parents had passed, Obie made sure he never got one ever. After Afghanistan and destroying Obie, Tony makes an Iron Man suit. He calls himself Iron Man and makes himself an Iron Dog.

Nick Fury finds out about Tony and sends the Avengers to go collect their newest member.

It takes a year and the attack on New York by Thor’s brother Loki for Tony to eventually give in and join. He spends his time away from them especially once they find out he never got his designated wolf and had to make his own.

Steve and Bucky head into the workshop one day because the Avengers are tired of Tony shutting himself out and they stand by the doorway in shock. Tony had just finished adding weapons to the Iron Dog.

“okay buddy over there is the robot. Let’s give it all you got in the arsenal department”

It was a bad idea and while Dum-E is trying to put out the big fire with his small extinguisher, Steve and Bucky arr heading over to make sure Tony an his robodog are okay. The explosion destroyed half the workshop.

“jarvis turn on the sprinklers before the whole building burns down”

“yes sir!”

“come on Tony let’s get you looked at. Bucky bring iron dog as well. Dum-E back to your station. You did good work”

Dum-E rolls around beeping happily with his fire extinguisher in the air before making his esy back to his station.

Since that time changes start happenin. The members make sure Tony isn’t alone anymore. Not out of fear of him hurting himself but mainly because tony shouldn’t be alone and they want to be his friend. Steve and Bucky do it because they are falling for the tech genius. Tony starts eating and sleeping more. He also starts to slowly form a bond with everyone and a year later he finds himself chatting with everyone while he cuddles with his new boyfriend’s Steve and Bucky. The wolves all form a cuddle pile while iron dog sets the heating on his body up to keep the pile toasty warm. They all sit down to watch a movie called Alpha.

Amd then more shit happens but that’s for the writers who wants to take this idea to decide. If you do take this idea, tag me in it. I want to see what kind of fics people came up with. I just need to take my mind off things. Read the tags

blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. I'm twenty, sort of artistic, I have an obsession with fictional reformed bad guys and enjoy writing fanfiction.

((Ravenclaw pride))

summary: Ok, yes, we have the headcanons that Thor would love the tiny little spider avenger, Loki would actually get along well with...
body: Ok, yes, we have the headcanons that Thor would love the tiny little spider avenger, Loki would actually get along well with this young hyperactive mortal, that Peter would freak out at meeting Doctor Banner, and that he would totally become best friends with Shuri off the bat, but imagine Natasha actually meeting Peter for the first time and he’s just so chipper and polite that Natasha doesn’t know how to react, like “Why is this kid calling me Ms. Black Widow and acting so happy to meet me?” Then he just starts lowkey fangirling because you know, she’s one of the original six avengers who saved the world from aliens.

summary: Who wanna bet that Anthony Mackie and Sebastian Stan would do some random press interview for Endgame,  even though they "not...
body:
Who wanna bet that Anthony Mackie and Sebastian Stan would do some random press interview for Endgame, even though they “not supposed to be in it”.

Interviewer: “Tell me, what exactly are you promoting? Are you in Endgame?!”

Anthony: “Nah man, I just felt left out so i called up Seb and was like wanna go do an interview?”

Sebastian: “ where ever he goes, I go.”

tags: Loki: The God of Mischief and Lies
Loki: The Rightful King of Jotunheim
summary: Dating Loki Odinson/Loki Laufeyson/The God of Mischief and Lies would include...
title: Dating Loki Odinson/Loki Laufeyson/The God of Mischief and Lies would include...
body:
(Gif and Picture above ^ are not mine!!!!! I just searched for a picture and a gif of Loki and ^ are the ones I chose to use!!!!!!)

  • Growing up together in Asgard and being best friends.
  • Him being in love with you since he was a very young child.
  • Him being very impressed with your skills as a warrior (since you’re better than Sif)
  • After being friends for many years Loki finally confesses his feelings for you during a Ball, and he asks you to be his lover, to which you accept without hesitation since you’ve had feelings for him for many years also.
  • For your first date Loki showed you his favorite balcony to watch the stars.
  • Him kissing you for the first time under the stars on that same balcony.
  • Hiding your relationship but Thor confronting Loki, grinning brightly because he knows the truth about the two of you.

“How did you know?”

  • Drooling and blushing when you walk in on him being shirtless and having messy hair.

(Picture is not mine!!!! It was the best picture I could find!!!! Link)

”Enjoying the view love?“

  • Going on walks together.

Sometimes you take your horses with you.

  • You comforting him when he finds out that he’s a Frost Giant.
  • Him being afraid that you will leave him but, you persuade him that you will never leave him.

“I will never leave you, Loki.”

  • You trying to persuade Loki to bring Thor banished during his time as King, to which he refuses.
  • Being devastated when Thor tells you that Loki fell off the Bifrost.
  • Going to Earth with Thor to stop Loki from taking over Earth.
  • Loki being surprised to see you on Earth since he expected that you had moved on from him.

“(Y/N)? What are you doing here? I have thought you would have moved on from me by now.”

  • You trying to convince him to stop trying to rule Earth and come back home with you.
  • Him refusing to do so. Which breaks your heart even more since you have to fight the man you love so dearly.
  • You reading your favorite books to Loki.
  • When You and Thor take him back to Asgard you hope that Odin will be generous on Loki’s punishment…
  • Cuddling with each other.
  • You patching Loki up all the time when he returns from battle.
  • Foreplay.
  • Slow and hot kisses all over your body.
  • Biting/ nibbling.
  • Him leaving hickeys on your neck to let others know that you belong to him.
  • Him playing with your breasts.
  • Dry humping and slipping your hand into his pants.
  • Hand jobs/fingering.
  • Making love.
  • Spooning.
  • Loki kissing your neck while touching your most sensitive area tenderly.
  • Bathtub sex.
  • Eye contact from across the room.
  • Him moaning and groaning into your ear because it turns you on so much.
  • Rough sex.
  • Angry make up sex after a bad fight.
  • Quickies in the morning and before Loki has to leave to do his duties.
  • Hugging him every time he wakes up from a nightmare about being tortured by Thanos (which happens almost all the time…).
  • Visiting him in his cell everyday even if Odin had forbid you to visit him.
  • “You have a good heart deep down, Loki.”
  • Passionate and long kisses because he can’t get enough of your lips.
  • Extremely passionate and slow sex because he wants you to feel how much he loves you.
  • Loki reaching out for your hand whenever he feels anxious, nervous or sad.
  • Braiding his hair while he’s sleeping on your lap.

“I can feel you braiding my hair, love…”

  • Him always slowly running his fingers on your arm, back, thigh, hand, anywhere.
  • Him calling you “My Queen.”.
  • Him waking up before you but staying in bed because he loves to watch you sleep.
  • You calling him "My King.”.
  • You being able to look through all his trickery to see the broken man he actually is.
  • Being completely spoiled by him.
  • Breaking Loki out of his prison cell and the two of you running away together.
  • Loki loving to carry you places.
  • Rough, possessive sex when Loki is feeling insecure.

“Y-you belong to me. I am a God. I am in control of you, love.”

  • Constantly assuring him that he’s enough.
  • Reading together.
  • Telling him that he’s not a monster.

“You are not a monster, Loki.”

  • Kissing his insecurities away.
  • Lip biting.
  • Protecting each other at all costs.
  • Him caressing your body with his icy fingers while whispering sweet nothings in your ear.
  • Holding hands while making love.
  • Always holding hands.
  • Forehead kisses.
  • Neck kisses.
  • “You are mine and only mine.”
  • Not taking a liking to his cruel habits, and would block him out for days as punishment.
  • Him calling you “darling” and “love” all the time, making you blush.
  • Having to convince him that he’s changed and that he’s a good man.
  • Cuddling with him while he reads you poetry that he’s written, listening to the smoothness of his voice and his words.
  • Comforting him after Frigga’s death because you know he was very close to her.
  • Admiring his emerald green eyes, often getting lost in them, evoking a soft chuckle from him.
  • Being the only one who can calm Loki down when he’s angry about something.

All you have to do is say his name and look into his eyes when he turns to you and he immediately calms down.

  • You’re the only one he listens to.
  • Being terrified of Thanos. (Well who isn’t? I mean really??? I would be too)
  • Passionate make out sessions in empty hallways of the castle.
  • Him getting jealous when you talk to other men. (Especially Thor and Fandral)
  • Frigga loving you as if your her own daughter.
  • Always being around each other.
  • Him needing to touch you in any way.
  • Jealous sex.
  • Passionate sex.
  • Slow sex.
  • “I love you so much, my queen…”

“I love you too, my king.”

  • “You are my king Loki.”
  • “What would I do without my queen?”
  • Him blushing immensely whenever you’re around.
  • Him constantly telling you how lucky he is to have you.
  • Random hugs from behind that make you grin uncontrollably.

  • Neck kisses.

  • “What would I do without my queen?”
  • Him blushing immensely whenever you’re around.
  • Him constantly telling you how lucky he is to have you.
  • Random hugs from behind that make you grin uncontrollably.
